DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine best time interval GnRH agonist ( triptorelin acetate ) ovulation induction allow high number mature oocytes ( MII ) collect IVF cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Time Interval Between Ovulation Trigger With Triptorelin Acetate Oocyte Retrieval
DOC.detailed_description: Human chorionic gonadotrophin ( hCG ) gold standard ovulation induction several decade . When GnRH antagonist protocol introduce , become possible trigger final oocyte maturation ovulation single bolus GnRH agonist ( GnRHa ) alternative hCG . The use GnRHa trigger final oocyte maturation potential advantage : simultaneous induction FSH surge , high number mature oocytes retrieve compare hCG total elimination ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome . From early report GnRHa ovulation trigger , presumed time ovum pick-up ( OPU ) GnRHa administration hCG trigger ( 34-36 h ) . However , difference exist regard duration profile GnRHa induce surge gonadotrophin compare hCG . Even , difference intra-follicular mechanism involve ovulation describe GnRHa hCG trigger . No previous randomize control trial report evaluate optimal interval time ovulation induction GnRHa oocyte collection . The present study compare ovarian response IVF outcomes induction triptorelin 0.2 mg four different time interval : Group 1 : OPU 24 hour GnRHa administration . Group 2 : OPU 30 hour GnRHa administration . Group 3 : OPU 40 hour GnRHa administration . Group 4 : control group : OPU 36 hour GnRHa administration .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent prior carry procedure associate clinical trial . Women 18 37 year age time randomization ( age include ) . Basal serum level FSH < 10 mIU /ml . Serum AMH > 5 < 45 pmol / l. Antral follicle count > 6 < 24 . Vaginal ultrasound document correct visualization ovary absence significant ovarian pathology . Short stimulation protocol GnRH antagonist conventional dose ovarian stimulation 225300 UI rhFSH . Number follicles â‰¥ 16 mm > 5 ovulation induction day . Presence severe endometriosis ( Grade IIIIV ) . Absence one ovary due previous surgery . Presence significant uterine pathology ( submucous myoma , endometrial polyp , malformations.. ) Diagnosis polycystic ovary syndrome ( define accord Rotterdam criterion ) . History previous poor response conventional ovarian stimulation protocol ( < 3 MII oocyte cancel cycle ) Severe male factor ( TMS < 1 million ) . Participation another RCT within past one year .
DOC.keyword: ovulation induction , oocyte maturation timing collection
